name: Koi Fish Together!
description:
A game about a Koi fish wondering around in a pond, trying to find friends to join his school of fish. But do know, you only have 3 minutes until you start all over again!

Use the mouse to direct the fish where to go, collide with other fish to get them to join your school.

Programming and game design by - Pigeon

Art and animation by - jetpack03

Music by - Woooa 9 Hamboy

If you enjoyed our game, make sure to rate it for the GMTK game jam 2021. It would be most appreciated by all of us. Thank you!
